DOC.brief_summary: This study 96-week study design evaluate safety efficacy GW873140 combination Kaletra HIV infect , untreated subject .
DOC.brief_title: GW873140 In Combination With Kaletra In HIV Infected Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: A Phase IIb , 96 week , randomize , open-label , multicenter , parallel group , repeat dose study evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics antiviral effect different dos regimens GW873140 combination Kaletra ( lopinavir ritonavir ) HIV-1 infected antiretroviral therapy naive subject
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : HIV infect , therapynaive subject . Females must either nonchildbearing age , negative pregnancy test . All subject participate study counsel practice safe sex use proven double barrier method contraception throughout study . Screening lab result plasma HIV1 RNA great equal 50,000 copies/mL CD4 cell count great equal 100 cells/mm3 . Have CC Chemokine Receptor5tropic ( R5tropic ) CC Chemokine Receptor5/CXC Chemokine Receptor4tropic ( R5/X4tropic ) virus base viral tropism test screen visit . Be treatmentnaive , define less equal 2 week treatment protease inhibitor ( PI ) nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor/nucleotide reverse transcriptase inhibitor ( NRTI/ NtRTI ) , less equal 7 day therapy nonnucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor ( NNRTI ) . Prior treatment entry inhibitor , attachment inhibitor , fusion inhibitor ( experimental approve ) allow . Be able understand follow protocol requirement , instruction protocolstated restriction . Signed date write informed consent prior study entry . Exclusion criterion : No detection CXC Receptor4tropic ( X4tropic ) virus , base viral tropism test screening . No active Class C AIDSdefining illness . No laboratory abnormalities screen . No significant blood loss prior study start . No pregnant breastfeeding woman . Additional qualify criterion determine physician .
